ygData.subject: RE: How many of u guys at Tribunal?
ygData.msgSnippet: Great minds think alike ;).  As in my previous mail, I dun mind sparing 10-20pp, which I believe can use to purchase quite a descent set of newbie equipements
ygData.messageBody:
Great minds think alike ;). As in my previous mail, I dun mind sparing
10-20pp, which I believe can use to purchase quite a descent set of newbie
equipements tat can last u for the 1st 5-8 lvls at least. I do that to my
wiz friend in Inno and he is still using those stuffs at lvl 12 ;)

Btw, I also didnt power train my friend's wiz. I tried once power train
his ranger char and buy him weap/armor. In the end he dun have much EQ
experience (not experience 'points'!) like those who started in scratch and
lost his corpse (lvl 7 or 8) after dying (cant locate his corpse) - waste
my money and time. After tat I ask him to think clearly what he wanan be
and he selected wiz. I passed some pp to him, buying a set of clothes, and
some lvl 1 & 4 spells and I leave him to "rot", heheh. Now he is already
lvl 12 wiz, able to stand on his own. Tat's why I never believe in power
twinking & baby-sitting others ;) No doubts it's very shiok to wear ROO,
SOO, glowing stein etc at lvl 1 wiz, but ultimately u will also miss alot
of "knowledge and wisdom (fun)", hehe.

Les and FF will be in a better position to explain an incident where we
meet a 'super-blur-fu*k' power-twinked lvl 40 magi when we camp in Najena
for FBR, LOL.

Ziltus

p/s: Part-time baby-sitting is still accepted by me. If u training a
ranger, i guess our guild shld be able to help u out abit in lvling, since
now most of us can handle things well and we just need someone to track for
named mob ;)

p/s: Most of us are playing good races, except Nica and Kenven. If u start
evil race char and hang ard evil race region, we wont be able to help u too
often ;)
